review: My only complaint is the limited amount of apps that are supported on the Chromecast.  The screencast does work but the resolution isn't the clearest.  Besides that,  I am really happy with it.
author: Alexis baptiste

review: A gift for my mom and it is easy to use once you set up your gadgets to connect with the device.
author: bee

review: Really simple....its outstanding....if you love streaming and watching Youtube,etc in full screen on a 60 inch...then this is for you! I use it all the time, so easy....go get one!!
author: Steve DeGregorio "flyers2114"

review: It works, sometimes it's difficult to get the program it's streaming to play, but we aren't unhappy with it.
author: Rubyanna "Rubyanna"

review: If you love Netflix or YouTube, this is a must have!  Put one in all of my T.V.'s.  Love just turning it on as a changing painting when we have company over!  If you have your sound system connected to you T.V. it works great with pandora as well!  Very easy to connect and No Buffering if you have good internet connection and speed!  MUST HAVE FOR TECH HEADS!
author: Todd

review: No Amazon Prime app available...What's up with that?
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love it but I just wish we could view pictures videos and other things through it.
author: Mark Herron
